jd: From: Vijayakumar R, TechStar Group vijay@techstargroup.com Reply to: vijay@techstargroup.com Role: Azure Databricks DeveloperLocation: Remote/Dallas, TXDuration: 6+ months contract Job Description:At least 10+ years of experience in Information Technology.Proven experience with Azure, Databricks and Hadoop distributed frameworks while handling large amount of big data using Spark and Hadoop Ecosystems.Hands-on experience with Spark or ScalaGood experience in end-to-end implementation of data warehouse and data marts Preferred Qualifications: Strong understanding of databases and big data software technologies, specifically Azure and Databricks.Experience with Agile methodologies, particularly Scrum.Experience in coordinating with offshore data engineering teamsExperience with scripting languages like Python, Java, etc.Strong problem-solving skills related to data, data structures, and algorithms.Experience/Knowledge of Healthcare domain is a plusExperience working in a Global Delivery environment, client stakeholders spread across the globe to accomplish project goalsAbility to work in team in diverse/ multiple stakeholder environmentExcellent verbal and written communication skills
